opinion.opinion_text:
The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of August 2008 by State of NC for Extension of Time to File Brief:
Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 11th day of October 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of August 2008.Page 1
